lead_paragraph: The daughter of a C.I.A. officer enshrined on the Memorial Wall expresses “indignation and disgust” with President Trump’s speech there.
snippet: The daughter of a C.I.A. officer enshrined on the Memorial Wall expresses “indignation and disgust” with President Trump’s speech there....

headline.main: Trump’s Visit Offends Fallen C.I.A. Man’s Daughter
headline.print_headline: President’s Visit Offends Fallen C.I.A. Man’s Daughter
